mapper.select: SELECT MR.REPLYNO, MR.MOVIECD, MR.USERNO, UR.USER_NAME, MR.COMMENT, MR.CREATE_DTM FROM W_MOVIE_REPLY MR INNER JOIN W_USER UR ON MR.USERNO = UR.USERNO WHERE MR.MOVIECD = #{movieCd}

SELECT BD.BRDNO, BD.USERNO, UR.USER_NAME, BD.TITLE, BD.CONTENT, BD.CREATE_DTM FROM W_BRD BD INNER JOIN W_USER UR ON BD.USERNO = UR.USERNO WHERE 1=1
AND BD.TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{title}, '%')
AND BD.USERNO LIKE CONCAT('%', #{userNo}, '%')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO W_BRD VALUES (#{userNo}, #{title}, #{content}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT BR.REPLYNO, BR.USERNO, UR.USER_NAME, BR.COMMENT, BR.CREATE_DTM FROM W_BRD_REPLY BR INNER JOIN W_USER UR ON BR.USERNO = UR.USERNO WHERE BR.BRDNO = #{brdNo}
